text: Asha-Rose Mtengeti Migiro (born 9 July 1956) is a Tanzanian politician and diplomat who was the Deputy Secretary-General of the United Nations from 2007 to 2012. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy Secretaries-General of the United Nations Category:Tanzanian politicians Category:Tanzanian lawyers Category:Tanzanian diplomats
title: Asha-Rose Migiro
